definition: to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread

sentences.english: You can uSE your comp uter to create your own fashion spreadsheet.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用电脑创建自己的穿衣表。

sentences.english: You should wear protective clothing, sunglasses, and sunscreen when in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光下注意穿衣，太阳镜和遮光剂。

sentences.english: There is no right way to dress or right way to wear your hair.
sentences.chinese: 怎样穿衣或者留什么发型，都没有所谓的对错之分。

sentences.english: Lucy is too young to dress herself.
sentences.chinese: 露西太小了，不能给自己穿衣服。

sentences.english: She fritters away all her money on clothes and trips to the cinema.
sentences.chinese: 她把所有的金钱都浪费在穿衣服和看电影上了。

sentences.english: I will wear no clothes, which will distinguish me from my fellowmen .
sentences.chinese: 我不会穿衣服的，这样我就会显得与众不同。

sentences.english: My grandmother is too old to dress herself.
sentences.chinese: 我奶奶年纪太大了而不能自己穿衣服。

sentences.english: He was an emperor wearing no clothes.
sentences.chinese: 他已是一个没穿衣服的国王。

sentences.english: John was humming a tune when he put on his clothes.
sentences.chinese: 约翰一边穿衣服一边哼着曲子。

sentences.english: Give us some tips for how to dress well for men.
sentences.chinese: 关于男人应该怎么穿衣，给我们一些建议吧。

sentences.english: They do not wear clothes, just banana leaves and they live in caves.
sentences.chinese: 他们不穿衣服，只围着香蕉叶，住在山洞里。

sentences.english: Every day,his mother dresses him and feeds him.
sentences.chinese: 每天妈妈给他穿衣服喂饭，爸爸送他上学。

sentences.english: He wants to be a Santa. Look! He forgot to wear the clothes.
sentences.chinese: 老大一定要当圣诞老人，抢了帽子却忘了穿衣服。

sentences.english: And she loved to play dress-up with him.
A bearded peer appeared on the pier to peer in the pier glass .
sentences.chinese: 一个长胡子的贵族出现在码头上凝视着穿衣镜。

sentences.english: Look for the woman in the dress.
sentences.chinese: 记得要寻找穿衣服的女人。

definition: (Tw) to wear selected items of clothing in combination to achieve a particular look/fashion styling
to stay warm/to protect against the cold
to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread
